Author: scaredyk4t

Author: elyoasaen
Text: I feel for you I really do it can feel so uncomfortable and guilt inducing just remember you are valid and only human You are not a robot and cannot be expected to stick to the high expectations we set for ourselves we all break sometimes. Just the fact that you know that purging shouldnâ€™t be an option is an amazing thing to be able to think and just know that it is only going to benefit you long term stopping  In regards to feelings of overeating equating failure and weight gain remember that our bodies are quite smart and will not be ruined with one bad day(s) sometimes itâ€™s even helpful to up calories periodically as we can speed up our metabolism like this (I THINK THIS IS WHAT I FEEL HAPPENS IN MY CASE)
